name: Aliens in the Attic
description:
Aliens in the Attic is an action-platformer game developed by Revistronic. It came out on 04-08-2009. It was published by Playlogic Entertainment. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Aliens in the Attic is available on PlayStation 2, Nintendo DS and PC.
Barry Josephson produced the game. John Schultz directed the game. It was scored by John Debney.
